mil3.1.8:2.6: “Vamena, bhante, hatthena yavakalapam gahetva dakkhinena hatthena dattam gahetva dattena chindanti”ti.
mil3.1.8:3.1: “Yatha, maharaja, yavalavako vamena hatthena yavakalapam gahetva dakkhinena hatthena dattam gahetva yavam chindati;
mil3.1.8:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogavacaro manasikarena manasam gahetva pannaya kilese chindati, evam kho, maharaja, uhanalakkhano manasikaro, evam chedanalakkhana panna”ti.
